column4: any suggestions as how to enable swfdec? i installed the package swfdec-mozilla but it does not work..
you'll probably need to disable the official flash plugin to be able to use swfdec (Tools/Addons/Plugins)
i dont have any flashplayer installed currently
it seems in tools/addons/plugins of firefox no installation of an installed package as a plugin to firefox is possible (besides the fact that i use arora)
